metadata.title: CVE-2024-26767 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fixed integer types and null check locations [why]: issuesfixed: - comparison with wider integer type in loop condition which cancause infinite loops - pointer dereference before null check

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
